title: STAT+: Roivant immune drug significantly outperformed placebo in treating rare skin disease
description: In a small trial, Roivant's immune drug significantly outperformed placebo in clearing lesions caused by a rare skin disease.
content: In a small trial, Roivant's immune drug significantly outperformed placebo in clearing lesions caused by a rare skin disease.
